title: Diamond Botlane Duo - Xerath Janna AKA Storm of the Century

embed.description: Duo Queue with Rhia - Xerath Janna bot lane AKA STORM OF THE CENTURY!!!

body:
Welcome to our stream! Rhia and Utility Backline are a diamond duo who are both support mains. We said fuck all them ADCs who tilted off the face of the Earth. We run bot lane the way we want it run. Fighting, and winning. Our bot lane combo is dubbed the Storm of the Century, and we are looking for eager storm chasers to come be a part of our fun. 

What will you find in our stream? Endless fighting. No AD champs. Sometimes Fiddlesticks! No Fake (weather) News!

We have no rules either. PC plebs are still welcome but they will find no trigger warnings. Come BM! 

Cheers.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=ZimHhUqG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-08T02:42:29.352+0000)
>
> I like this idea.

We've been doing it now for 2 weeks. Its honestly been a blast. Sick of adcs? Duo with another support haha.

> [{quoted}](name=A Nunu,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=ZimHhUqG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-08T08:36:14.216+0000)
>
> Oh hey, I had you in one of my games today. What a coincidence finding this.
> #You both collectively went 0/4 immediately
>  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=a+nunu

900 damage versus your counterpart Kayn who ganked, did 4K more damage than you, outfarmed you by 40 cs, and ganked all game. I also did more damage than their bot lane combined and Xerath did even more. Rofl you're a joke dude. P1 hardstuck.

I don't even know why I'm wasting my time responding to a person that abused overpowered supports to get diamond right now..

1. Nunu is a support jungler without any actual damage built into his kit, and Kayn is a skirmisher. Kayn dealing more damage and ganking more is just the most obvious thing that could ever happen in a situation like this.
2. You are Janna and Xerath. No shit you'll be doing more damage on the charts. All you do is just poke. Over time your damage dealt in lane adds up. Your score on the damage charts mean absolutely nothing, since it didn't show at all in lane.
3. I am ironically playing the most useless champion in the entire game, and that champion only. If it wasn't completely painfully obvious that I was smurfing, I have no idea what to even say to you.

P.S: Please don't try to call people hardstuck when you're still diamond 5 after all those years of playing, even when having ardent meta. :)

Please think before you post while on your salt spree, yeah? :)

Roasted. Stay toasted.

Poor child.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
